result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: I hated him passionately with all my heart.
